xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Class BookVersions.Code.VersionClass_precedingVersionReference=Preceding version reference BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_draft=Draft BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_review=Review BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_complete=Complete BookVersions.Code.PageTranslationClass_status_not_translated=Not Translated BookVersions.Code.PageTranslationClass_status_outdated=Outdated BookVersions.Code.PageTranslationClass_status_translated=Translated
# Library Reference Class BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference=Library Reference BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference.Empty=--- BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference_= BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference=Library Version Reference BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference.Empty=--- BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference_=
# Publication Configuration Class BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source=Source page* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source_hint=The top page of the tree to be published, usually the top page of the book/library. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace=Destination space* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace_hint=The space where the content will be published. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version=Version* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version_hint=The version to publish. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant=Variant BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant_hint=The variant to publish. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language=Language BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language_hint=The language to publish. If none is selected, all the "Translated" languages will be published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete=Publish only "Complete" pages BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete_hint=Publish only the pages with the status "Complete". If unchecked, all statuses are published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder=Publish page order BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder_hint=Publish the page order from the source, which might overwrite the target ordering. If unchecked, the target ordering is left untouched. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour=Publication behaviour BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_hint=Which behaviour to adopt when the target space is already populated. "Cancel" for not publishing ; "Update" to publish update existing pages, add new pages from source but leave page deleted from source in the destination. Pages marked as deleted in source will be removed from destination ; "Re-publish" to reset the destination space. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_cancel=Cancel BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_update=Update BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_republish=Re-publish BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description=Description BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description_hint=The description of the configuration BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.sourceLocationLabel=Location BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.sourceLocationHint=Location in the page hierarchy which will be the source of the publication BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationSpaceLabel=Name of the space BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationSpaceHint=(optional) If you want to create a new space with the specified name. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationLocationLabel=Destination BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationLocationHint=Location in the page hierarchy which will be the destination of the publication BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationWikiLabel=Wiki name BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationWikiHint=Name of the wiki for the publication destination
# Sheet BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.versionConfiguration=Version Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.librariesConfiguration=Libraries Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.newConfiguration=New configuration BookVersions.Code.VariantClassSheet.associatedPages=Associated Pages BookVersions.Code.VariantClassSheet.variantConfiguration=Variant Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.deleteLibrairieConfiguration=Delete BookVersions.Code.DeletedContentClassSheet.titlePrefix=DELETED: BookVersions.Code.DeletedContentClassSheet.warning=This content has been marked as deleted. It won't be published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.nextButton=Preview
# -- Publication canceled messages BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.previewTitle=Publication preview BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.publicationCanceledBecauseTargetIsNotEmpty=Publication will be canceled because target space **{0}** is not empty. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.existingDocuments=**Existing documents:** BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.existingDocumentLine=* {0} # -- Publication republish / removal BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.publicationWillRepublish=Publication will republish to target space: **{0}** BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.theFollowingDocumentsWillBeRemoved=The following documents will be removed: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.docWouldBeRemoved=Document to be removed: {0} # -- Publishing from / variant BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.publishingFrom=Publishing from: **{0}** BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.usingVariant=Using variant: {0} # -- Library usage / warnings BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.usingLibrary=Using library: **{0}** (version: {1}) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.publishedAt=Published at: {0} BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.libraryIsNotPublished=Library **{0}** (version: {1}) is not published! Content including this library may not work as expected. # -- Pages to process BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pagesToProcess=**Pages to process:** # -- Page publication lines BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageWillBePublished=‚úÖ **{0}** ‚Üí {1} BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.contentFrom=(content from: {0}) # -- Deleted or skipped pages BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageIsMarkedDeleted=‚ùåÔ∏è **{0}**: Page is marked as deleted BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageHasSomething=‚ùåÔ∏è **{0}**: {1} BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageIsMarkedDeletedRemoveFromTarget=üóëÔ∏è **{0}** is marked as deleted - Target will be removed: {1} BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageWillBeDeletedFromTarget=üóëÔ∏è **{0}** will be deleted (Source: {1}) # -- Deletion summary BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.documentsToBeRemovedFromTarget=**Documents to be removed from target ({0}):** BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageOrderWillBePreserved=**Page order will be preserved in the publication.** # -- Legend BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.legend=**Legend:** BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.legendWillBePublished=* ‚úÖ - Page will be published BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.legendWillBeSkipped=* ‚ùåÔ∏è - Page will be skipped BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.legendWillBeDeleted=* üóëÔ∏è - Page/document will be deleted # -- No preview data BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.noPreviewDataAvailable=No preview data available. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.previewContinueButton=Publish BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.pageNotInPublishedVariant=‚ùåÔ∏è **{0}** Page is ignored because it is not associated with the published variant.
# Publication process BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.nullParameter=One of the provided parameters is null. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.start=Starting publication job with configuration [{0}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.loadConfiguration=Loading configuration. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.noConfig=No configuration provided (null or empty). BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.noSource=Could not read the source from [{0}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.noTarget=Could not read the target from [{0}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.noBehaviour=Could not read the behavior from [{0}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.targetNotEmpty=Publication is canceled because destination space [{0}] is not empty. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.targetEmptying=Destination space [{}] is not empty. Removing all documents. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.sourceNotExist=The provided source reference [{}] does not exist. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.startPublication=Start publication. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.refNotFound=Page publication cancelled because the reference can''t be found. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.startPagePublication=Start page publication {0}/{1}: [{2}] BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.notCollection=Page is not recognized as a book/library page. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.noContent=Page publication cancelled because the content to be published can''t be found. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.targetRefNotComputed=Page publication cancelled because the published reference can''t be computed. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.copyPage=Copying page [{0}] to [{1}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.transformContent=Transforming content for publication. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.endPagePublication=End publication of page [{0}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.removeMarkedAsDeleted=Removing the pages marked as deleted from the target space. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.updatePageOrder=Updating page ordering. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.publishInternal.endPublication=Publication finished in space [{0}].
BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.isToBePublished.markedAsDeleted=Page is [{0}] ignored because it is marked as deleted. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.isToBePublished.status=Page [{0}] is ignored because its status is [{1}] and only [{2}] page are published. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.isToBePublished.variantPage=Page [{0}] is ignored because it is associated with variants. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.isToBePublished.otherVariant=Page [{0}] is ignored because it is not associated with the published variant [{1}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.isToBePublished.noTranslation=Page [{0}] is ignored because it is not associated with the published language [{1}]. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.isToBePublished.noCompleteTranslation=Page is [{0}] ignored because the translation doesn''t have a [{1}] status. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.transformSiblingBookPage.notInCollection=The [{0}] macro refers to page [{1}] which collection [{2}] is not the same as the currently published collection [{3}]. Macro is ignored. On the published page, it won''t probably display anything. BookVersions.DefaultBookVersionsManager.transformLibrary.notPublished=The library [{0}] has not been published. Macro is ignored.
# Creation templates BookVersions.template.newBook=Create a new book. BookVersions.template.newLibrary=Create a new library. BookVersions.template.description=Description BookVersions.template.title=Title
# Page Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newPage=New page BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle=Page title BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle.hint=The title of the page. BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned=Unversioned content BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned.hint=When the page is unversioned, the option of creating different content for multiple versions will be disabled and the same content of the page will be displayed in all versions of the book. It will be possible, though, to switch back to versioned content. BookVersions.creationForm.create=Create BookVersions.creationForm.add=Add BookVersions.creationForm.name=Name BookVersions.creationForm.libTitle=Library title
# Version Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newVersion=New version
# Variant Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newVariant=New variant
# Library Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newLibrary=Add library
# Publication Configuration Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newPublicationConfiguration=Add publication configuration
# Navigation menu BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect=Version BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.hint=Content version: {0} BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.noContent=Not available BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.unversioned=Unversioned BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.inherited=No content is available for this page in the version {0} so the content inherited from version {1} is displayed. BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.versionned=The content of this page come from version {0}. BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.noVersion=This page is unversioned, so the content is the same for each version. BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.noContent=The page is versioned, but it doesn''t have content for version {0} or preceding versions, so no content is displayed. BookVersions.navMenu.createVersionWithLink=Create content for version {0} BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect=Variant BookVersions.navMenu.pageIsNotAssociated=Not linked to variant BookVersions.navMenu.pageRestrictedTo=Restricted to variant(s): {0} BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect.tooltip.restricted=Page restricted to variant(s): {0}. This page will be published only for this/these variant(s). BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect.tooltip.notAssociatedVariantSelect=Page not linked to any variant. If the page use the ''variant'' macro, only the content for the {0} variant will be shown. BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect.tooltip.notAssociatedNoVariantSelected=Page not linked to any variant. If the page use the macro, the content of all these macros is displayed. BookVersions.navMenu.associateVariantWithLink=Link page to variant {0} BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect=Language BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected=Language: none BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelected=Language: {0} BookVersions.navMenu.languageDefaultSelected=Language: {0} (default) BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect.tooltip.languageSelected=Content is shown for language {0}. Content out of the language macro is also shown. BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect.tooltip.languageDefaultSelected=Content is shown in the default language {0}. Content out of the language macro is also shown. BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect.tooltip.noLanguageSelected=Content outside the ''Content translation'' macro and inside the default language one is displayed. BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.not_translated=Translation status: needed BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.outdated=Translation status: outdated BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.translated=Translation status: done BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.tooltip.not_translated=Translation is marked as needed in the translation macro. BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.tooltip.outdated=Translation is marked as outdated in the translation macro. BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.tooltip.translated=Translation is marked as done in the translation macro.
# Administration menu BookVersions.adminMenu.title=Versions BookVersions.adminMenu.manage=Manage BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVersions=Versions BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVariants=Variants BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLibraries=Libraries BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLanguages=Languages BookVersions.adminMenu.pageActions=Page Actions BookVersions.adminMenu.overview=Overview BookVersions.adminMenu.addPageToVariant=Link page to variant {0} BookVersions.adminMenu.removePageFromVariant=Unlink page from variant {0} BookVersions.adminMenu.publishLable=Publishing BookVersions.navMenu.convertToUnversioned=Convert to unversioned BookVersions.navMenu.convertToVersioned=Convert to versioned BookVersions.adminMenu.statusLable=Status BookVersions.adminMenu.publish=Publication BookVersions.navMenu.markDeleted=Mark as deleted BookVersions.navMenu.unmarkDeleted=Unmark as deleted BookVersions.navMenu.deleteVersion=Delete this version BookVersions.navMenu.deleteAllVersions=Delete all versions BookVersions.navMenu.deletePage=Delete this page BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected=No language was selected. BookVersions.navMenu.defaultLanguage=Default language. BookVersions.adminMenu.librariesText=The following libraries are configured to be used in the current book. To edit the configuration, go to the {0}Versions administration page of the book{1} and edit the version pages. BookVersions.adminMenu.libraries.showPagesBtn=Show associated pages BookVersions.adminMenu.libraries.macrosPagesListHeading=Pages containing library macro BookVersions.adminMenu.libraries.noMacroUsingPage=No pages use this library macro.

# Variants linked pages Admin UI BookVersions.variants.linkedPagesListHeading=Pages linked with selected variant BookVersions.variants.macrosPagesListHeading=Pages containing variant macro BookVersions.variants.noLinkedPage=No pages linked to this variant. BookVersions.variants.noMacroUsingPage=No pages use this variant macro. BookVersions.variants.showPagesForVariant=Show linked pages for variant: BookVersions.variants.loadPagesBtn=Show associated pages
# Library include macro rendering.macro.includeLibrary.name=Include Library (Book Versions) rendering.macro.includeLibrary.description=Include content from a versioned library rendering.macro.includeLibrary.parameter.keyReference.name=Library key rendering.macro.includeLibrary.parameter.keyReference.description=The key of a library to get the content from
# Excerpt Library include macro rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.name=Excerpt Include Library (Book Versions) rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.description=Includes excerpts from libraries into the current page. The included pages need to contain the simple `excerpt` macro. Requires XWiki SAS's Pro Macros (paid extension). rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.keyReference.name=Library key rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.keyReference.description=The key of a library to get the content from rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.name.name=Name rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.name.description=The name of the excerpt to be displayed rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.nopanel.name=No panel rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.nopanel.description=Disable the panel rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.inline.name=Inline rendering.macro.excerptIncludeLibrary.parameter.inline.description=Use the macro in inline mode. When in inline mode, the panel parameter is ignored.
# Content Translation macro rendering.macro.contentTranslation.name=Content Translation (Book Versions) rendering.macro.contentTranslation.description=Add translated content rendering.macro.contentTranslation.parameter.language.name=Language rendering.macro.contentTranslation.parameter.title.name=Title rendering.macro.contentTranslation.parameter.status.name=Status rendering.macro.contentTranslation.parameter.status.description=Status of the translation for the current language. rendering.macro.contentTranslation.parameter.isDefault.name=Is default rendering.macro.contentTranslation.parameter.isDefault.description=If true, the current language is the default language that is used when displaying the content of the page.
# Variant macro rendering.macro.variant.name=Variants content (Book Versions) rendering.macro.variant.description=Add content for specific variants rendering.macro.variant.parameter.name.name=Variants rendering.macro.variant.parameter.name.description=The multiple variants to which the content will be related to.
# Versions Admin UI BookVersions.versions.LD.status=Status BookVersions.versions.LD.doc.date=Last edit BookVersions.versions.LD.doc.name=Version BookVersions.versions.LD.doc.title=Page title BookVersions.versions.LD.doc.creationDate=Creation date BookVersions.versions.LD.emptyvalue= BookVersions.versions.LD.confirmDelete=Deleting this version will also trigger the deletion of content pages related to it. It requires Delete right on the whole book/library. Are you sure?
# Overview Admin UI BookVersions.overview.LD.status=Status BookVersions.overview.LD.doc.date=Last edit BookVersions.overview.LD.doc.name=Version BookVersions.overview.LD.doc.title=Page title BookVersions.overview.LD.doc.creationDate=Creation date BookVersions.overview.LD.emptyvalue= BookVersions.overview.LD.variantsList=Variants list

BookVersions.language.select=Select language ... BookVersions.Code.MultilingualClass_enabled=Support multiple translation languages BookVersions.Code.MultilingualClass_supportedLanguages=Enabled translation languages
# Edit inherited content BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupTitle=Edit inherited content from {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupDescription=The content for version {0} does not exist. You have the option to either create the content for this version, or to switch to version {1}. BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupSwitchVersion=Switch to version {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupCreateContentForVersion=Create content for version {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupCancel=Cancel
# Version delete BookVersions.Code.CustomVersionDeleteHandler.popupTitle=Delete version BookVersions.Code.CustomVersionDeleteHandler.popupDescription=Deleting this version will also trigger the deletion of content pages related to it. It requires Delete right on the whole book/library. BookVersions.Code.CustomVersionDeleteHandler.popupProceed=Delete all BookVersions.Code.CustomVersionDeleteHandler.popupCancel=Cancel

# Set status progress BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.statusMissing=Please set a status value to set on the pages BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.changeStatusFailed=Change status batch job failed BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.changeStatus=Change status BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.changeStatusProgress=Change status progress BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.statusField=New status BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.statusFieldHint=The new status to set on the selected pages BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.statusPlaceHolder=Select the new status BookVersions.Code.BookOverview.changeStatusBtn=Change status on selected pages
